Verify the 'Login' button is visible, has background color #007bff, text color white, font size 16px, font weight 600, border radius 4px, and 1px solid border #007bff
Confirm the main product title element displays 'Deluxe Widget Pro', has font family 'Arial', text size 24px, color rgb(33,37,41), and is centered horizontally with text align 'center'
Check the 'Search...' input field's placeholder text is 'Find products...', its width is 200px, height 40px
Verify the 'Search...' input field becomes focused with 2px solid border #0000FF when clicked
Ensure the user profile image is loaded, its source is 'user_avatar.png', rendered dimensions are 50x50px, and has alt text 'User Profile Picture'
Validate the shopping cart icon displays a count of 3 items, has top position 10px, right position 15px, and background color #dc3545
Verify the 'Dashboard' navigation link is active, has text color #007bff, 1px solid bottom border, and padding 10px 15px
Confirm the video player is not muted, occupies 100% viewport width, and has height 56.25% of its width
Confirm the video player's 'Play' button has opacity 0.8 when hovered
Check the error message 'Invalid credentials.' is visible, has font size 14px, color #dc3545, background color #f8d7da, and margin 10px top and bottom
Ensure the sidebar menu is initially hidden, has width 250px, background color #f8f9fa, and animates into view over 300ms with 'slide-in' animation
Verify the 'Premium Plan' card has 2px solid border #28a745 when selected and border radius 8px
Verify the 'Premium Plan' card's pricing text shows '$29.99/month' with font weight 700
Confirm the 'Submit' button is disabled, has background color #e9ecef, text color #6c757d, and opacity 0.7
Check the first image thumbnail has source 'gallery_thumb_1.jpg' and rendered dimensions 100x75px
Check the first image thumbnail has 2px solid border #007bff when selected, transitioning over 50ms
Verify the date picker input field shows today's date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format and has value '2023-10-27'
Verify the date picker input field's label is 'Date of Birth'
Click 'Scroll to Top'
Verify the scroll position of the main content area is 0 (scroll-top 0)
Verify a 50px top shadow becomes visible with opacity 0.5
Check the modal overlay is visible, has background color rgba(0,0,0,0.5), covers full viewport (left 0, right 0, top 0, bottom 0), and has z-index 1000
Verify the product description text block has padding 20px on all sides, text align 'justify', font size 15px, and line height 1.6
Confirm the video player's 'Fullscreen' button is enabled
Confirm the video player's 'Fullscreen' button becomes focused with 1px yellow border #FFFF00
Confirm the video player's 'Fullscreen' button changes opacity to 1.0 when hovered
Ensure the 'Download Report' link has aria-label 'Download the latest financial report', color #17a2b8, and bottom margin 20px
Verify there are exactly 5 carousel indicators, each with width 10px, height 10px, and circular shape (border radius 50%)
Verify the active carousel indicator has background color #007bff
Confirm the main hero image 'banner.jpg' is loaded within 500ms, displays a 'DEMO' watermark at its bottom-right corner with 0.5 opacity, and takes natural dimensions 1920x1080px
